roleset.name: not presenting new info

example.text: She subsequently underwent a hematology evaluation which included ferritin levels that were normal and a bone marrow biopsy that was unrevealing.

roleset.note: UNREVEALING-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in Thyme, framed by Claire. Based on comparison to reveal-v.01. (from unrevealing.01-j)
Unsure if all of these roles can occur with the negative polarity version, but are present for symmetry with reveal. (from unrevealing.01-j)
